attributes.action: I want regulations too be reviewed on private hire.
attributes.additional_details:
We are struggling very much in this sector financially and mentally.
The government does not intervene with this as strikes are going on everywhere else and we get no attention whatsoever.
attributes.background:
Because the industry of private hire has been flooded with new drivers and the old drivers are not making minimum wage.
Cost of living has risen and the operators keep putting the prices up and down.
Why can’t their have regulations like Hackney drivers have and there should be a cap on .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about certain practices in the private hire sector, but we're not sure exactly what you want the Government to review, and what you want the outcome of this review to be.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
